name: Keeper 2119
description: Keeper 2119 is about the experience of a character that after being completely controlled by a mysterious force, they enter a reality completely different to the known, with the assistance of a technological alien-type device called “Translocator Device” the character must overcome a certain number of challenges to escape using the teleportation provided from the "Translocator Device", while this mysterious force causes an internal doubt as to what the character believes as reality. Within the game we will be able  to complement the use of teleportation with 3 new sub-mechanics within each game space that will provide a new  gameplay so that the player can progress trougthout the game. The entire game takes place inside a spaceship, therefore each game space is represented by a specific area within the ship.
